  <header class="post-header">
	<div class="col-sm-12">
    <h1 class="post-title" style="margin-bottom:.1em;">Linked List 1: A grand bibliography</h1>
    <p class="post-meta lead">Oct 13, 2014 | Zacharias</p>
	</div>
  </header>
	<div class="container">
    	<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-12">

The only part of the Getting Things Done productivity framework that really stuck with me was the notion of ubiquitous capture. Meaning, I do a good job of recording stuff I've read, looked at, thought about, etc, in order to... 

That's the part I'm not as great at. But it incidentally does a good job of serving of recording my interests in web tech, and literal miscellany.  
</div>

<div class="col-md-6">
h4. Certainly Work Related 

"Integrating Lync into ASP.net applications":http://sharpsplash.wordpress.com/2012/08/03/integrate-microsoft-lync-into-a-asp-net-web-application/
"More Lync/ASP Integration":http://blogs.msdn.com/b/tomholl/archive/2013/03/02/integrate-lync-into-your-intranet-sites-using-the-namectrl-plug-in.aspx
"Google Analytics Reporting API":https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/reporting/core/v3/
"Javascript's New Keyword is confusing:":http://www.codeducky.org/javascript-new-confusing/
"C# Enums":http://www.codeducky.org/ins-outs-c-enums/
"Pass Razor Code to controller methods":http://www.codeducky.org/razor-trick-pass-razor-code-into-methods/
"Stephen Wexler Hat Trick: Razor Using Block":http://www.codeducky.org/razor-trick-using-block/
"Intro to SignalR":http://www.codemag.com/Article/1210071
"Getting Started with SignalR":http://www.asp.net/signalr/overview/signalr-20/getting-started-with-signalr-20/tutorial-getting-started-with-signalr-20-and-mvc-5
"GitHub Pages and apex domains":http://instantclick.io/github-pages-and-apex-domains
"Github Pages how httpses":https://konklone.com/post/github-pages-now-supports-https-so-use-it
"A Github Pages Frontend":https://github.com/prose/prose/wiki/Getting-Started
"Snackbar.js":http://fezvrasta.github.io/snackbarjs/
"Google Material Design + Bootstrap":https://fezvrasta.github.io/bootstrap-material-design/

</div>


<div class="col-md-6">

h4. Getting Colder

"(Book) O'Rielly Sinatra Book":http://shop.oreilly.com/product/0636920019664.do#PowerReview
"Infrastructure Automation with Chef":https://practicingruby.com/articles/infrastructure-automation
"God.rb":http://godrb.com/
"Learn Chef":http://learn.getchef.com/
"Chef Windows Opscode Cookbook":https://github.com/opscode-cookbooks/windows
"GetChef":http://docs.getchef.com/
"Learning Chef":http://mlafeldt.github.io/blog/learning-chef/
"Common Chef Idoims":https://www.getchef.com/blog/2013/09/04/demystifying-common-idioms-in-chef-recipes/
"Flat Icons: Academic":http://www.flaticon.com/packs/academic-2/5

h4. Even Colder

"Internet doc about Cyberwarfare":http://netwars-project.com/webdoc
"Nice use of bootstrap affix-ian effect mid-narrative":http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/special/2014/newsspec_8700/index.html
"Oil in the arctic":http://www.bloomberg.com/news/2014-09-27/rosneft-says-exxon-arctic-well-strikes-oil.html
"Despecialized Star Wars":http://www.polygon.com/2014/8/18/6030725/star-wars-hd-despecialized-edition


</div>

<div class="col-md-12">
<p>And that's a week</p>
